updater.util
Interface DownloadProgressListener

public interface DownloadProgressListener

Progress Listener for HTTPDownloader.

Author:
Chan Wai Shing

Method Summary
 void byteDownloaded(int numberOfBytes)
          Notify the byte downloaded since last notification.
 void byteStart(long pos)
          Notify which position to start the download from.
 void byteTotal(long total)
          Notify the total length of the file to download.
 void downloadRetry(DownloadResult result)
          The downloader is going to retry download.
 

Method Detail

byteStart

void byteStart(long pos)
Notify which position to start the download from. This should be called only once or less, and be called before first notifying byteDownloaded(int).

Parameters:
pos - the position

byteTotal

void byteTotal(long total)
Notify the total length of the file to download. This should be called only once or less, and be called before first notifying byteDownloaded(int).

Parameters:
total - the size in byte, -1 means length not known

byteDownloaded

void byteDownloaded(int numberOfBytes)
Notify the byte downloaded since last notification.

Parameters:
numberOfBytes - the bytes downloaded

downloadRetry

void downloadRetry(DownloadResult result)
The downloader is going to retry download. This will be invoked every time before the downloader is going to retry.

Parameters:
result - the reason for why the downloader will retry download
